sentences.sentence: I bet Sue gave you an earful when you got home.
sentences.translation: 我敢说你到家时苏肯定数落了你一番。

sentences.sentence: If he bothers you again, I will give him an earful.
sentences.translation: 如果他再来烦扰你，我将会给他一顿训斥。

sentences.sentence: He gave me an earful of complaints about his new boss.
sentences.translation: 他滔滔不绝向我抱怨他的新老板。
